author: Paul
content:
Even though I don't have issues with SmugMug, mostly because I don't use it much, I can certainly understand your frustration. I have been with a couple of different hosting companies over the years and was seriously frustrated with outages, etc. It doesn't take long to get fed up and move!

Yep! It could be just a guy thing. No need to sit around and talk about something endlessly. Fix the problem!
